body.name: DARENYI 16"x12" Acrylic Mirror Sheet, Flexible Non Glass Body Mirror Tiles Large Self Adhesive Mirror Stickers for Bathroom Bedroom Home Wall Decor (1pc)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 15 hrs 48 mins
features: High-Definition Imaging - Made of high quality acrylic material, it’s very smooth and has a good reflection. The thickness of 0.09" (2.5 mm) makes it not easy to warp and has a clear view at further distance than mirrors of 0.04"(1 mm). Overall size approx 30 x 40cm/ 11.81 x 15.75 in.
Shatterproof Mirror: These non-glass mirror sheets are made of shatter-resistant material, making them stronger and much safer than ordinary glass mirrors. The polished corners make it safer.

Easy to Install - No need to punch & No damage walls. With 1 pack of double-sided foam tape, you’re able to make the wall mirror firmly on the wall without falling off. After installation, please tear off the protective film on the surface.

Wide Application - Acrylic mirror sheet is a great alternative to fragile glass mirror, which can be adapted to lots of environment, like stalled in kids’ room to create a safer space; as wall decor, it can make your home or office look more spacious and bright; and many other places like bathroom, bedroom and living room, etc.

DIY As You Like - Can be combined as you wish, whatever square, rectangle or in other shapes, to make your home more elegant and warm. Perfect for door mirror, body mirror, gym mirror, dance mirror and home decor.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: DARENYI Self Adhesive Acrylic Mirror, 16"x12" Flexible Plastic Mirror Sheets Wall Stickers Non Glass Body Mirror Tiles The acrylic mirror sheet can be used as an interior decoration to achieve a mirror reflection, making the interior space more spacious, suitable for bedrooms, living rooms, bathrooms, dressing rooms, kitchens, gyms, offices, etc. You can use this to enlarge your space or illuminate the dark walls to make your home look different and more attractive.

Self Adhesive Mirror Sheet, DIY Your Own Style ! No need to punch & No damage walls. The mirror wall sticker comes with High-Sticky Adhesive Tape, which make the wall mirror firmly on the wall without falling off. mirror sheet can not only be combined as a long mirror in the bedroom, hallway and bathroom but also be separately used as gym wall decor, makeup mirror, door mirror to illuminate your space. works well for crafts and projects, you can display your creativity in your special way

How to Cut Step 1. Prepare Cutting Tools: We recommend using a hook knife, which is a cutting tool specially used to cut acrylic/plexiglass, plastic board and other materials. If you don't have one at home, you could use other cutting tools such as utility knife instead. ——Tips 1 - We do not recommend using scissors, as the thickness is 2.5mm, it will be very difficult to cut with scissors. Step 2. Marking: Lay the mirror stickers flat on the work station, determine where you need to cut and mark it.Step 3. Cutting: Please wear safety gloves before starting. First, put the steel ruler at the other end of the cutting mark line; And Then use the hook knife to cut along the line. ——Tips 2 - If there is unevenness in the cutting position, you can use sandpaper to smooth the cutting surface.

How to Cut Step 1. Prepare Cutting Tools: We recommend using a hook knife, which is a cutting tool specially used to cut acrylic/plexiglass, plastic board and other materials. If you don't have one at home, you could use other cutting tools such as utility knife instead. ——Tips 1 - We do not recommend using scissors, as the thickness is 2.5mm, it will be very difficult to cut with scissors. Step 2. Marking: Lay the mirror stickers flat on the work station, determine where you need to cut and mark it.Step 3. Cutting: Please wear safety gloves before starting. First, put the steel ruler at the other end of the cutting mark line; And Then use the hook knife to cut along the line. ——Tips 2 - If there is unevenness in the cutting position, you can use sandpaper to smooth the cutting surface.

HD Mirror Sheet Made of acrylic, compare with glass mirrors, acrylic mirrors are more durable while the reflection still as good as glass, enable you to use them for a long time. Overall Size 30 x 40 cm/ 11.8 x 15.7 inches. Thickness is 2.5mm / 0.09 inches. Smooth edages without burrs, safe to use. Protective Film There is a protective film on the surface of the mirror decals to prevent it from being scratched during delivery, please peel it off before using, and then you will get a HD acrylic mirror in good condition. How to Install 1. Clean the wall with a dry cloth 2. Clean the back of the mirror 3. Stick double-sided tape 4. Stick the mirror and the wall. 5.Tear off the mirror film, you can see the clear reflection

DARENYI Acrylic Mirror Sticker Apply to Metope Acrylic Mirror Sheet can be easily installed on smooth walls, latex paint walls, light-hole tiled wall furniture or wooden doors, but not for wallpaper, blistering wall, ash-falling wall, moistured wall, uneven wall. After fixed, do not move at will Please use mirror paste on a smooth surface, the flatter the wall, the better the reflection. HOW TO CLEAN: Simply add a SMALL amount of MILD liquid detergent to warm water (detergent is not necessary, it depends on your needs), then use a SOFT cloth to GENTLY wipe the surface dry. IMPORTANT!!! due to acrylic material, please Don't use solvents, such as methylated spirits and turpentine, which are unnecessary and not recommended; using such materials may cause irreversible surface damage to the acrylic mirror.

REMOVAL TIPS 1. Use a hairdryer to warm up sponge tape areas 2. Use a thin knife or a fishing line/copper wire,reachinto the gap between the mirror and wallcut off thesponge tapes in between 3. Clean the tape residuals on the wall and mirror PLEASE NOTE 1. Due to manual measurement, there may be an error of 0.5 ~ 2 mm. 2. Before the first use, tear off a layer of protective film (if the protective film is not torn off, the mirror surface will be blurred). 3. Only clean the mirror with a soft cloth and warm water 4. If there are any problems. please feel free to contact with us,we will reply in 24h and try our best to solve it : )

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for toddler & Montessori self care station
reviews.reviewText: Bought this twicePlaced in bathroom so my little has a mirror at her height. She loved to look at herself after having hair done or while brushing her teeth or just because it’s thereEasy to cleanClear reflectionMy toddler is tough on it but it has remained scratch free and clear

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent for what I need it for.
reviews.reviewText: Using it outside to get pictures of wildlife seeing their own reflection. Should be fun and I won't have to worry about then breaking any glass. Super product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This mirror is the perfect addition to the inside door of my cabinet. I use it to put on make-up. It came perfect with no scratches or marks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars GOOD MIRROR Cannot be cut with scissors
reviews.reviewText: Cannot be cut with scissors. It shatters. This is my edited review. But the mirror itself is very clear.Read on……Since one of the photos the seller has in the description shows scissors cutting the mirror, that’s why I purchased this. When the plastic shattered, posted a negative review. I changed this review because I wrote the seller. They said that they upgraded their product and requested Amazon to update the photos in the listing. They expressed their frustration and they were very apologetic.They told me that this mirror is plexiglass and can be cut with a hook knife or plexiglass knife. I checked and found the plexiglass knife at my local big box store and it costs a little over $5. Since I wanted to do a project with young kids I told the seller that knives were not feasible and asked for a refund which the seller quickly gave me.Let me say this about the mirror. The reflection is EXTREMELY CLEAR. in some ways it is clearer than the standard mirrors. What makes the image clearer is that this the mirror is thinner than the standard glass mirror. Although it’s not a FIRST SURFACE mirror, it’s so thin that the image appears clearer especially at close distances.I changed this review from one star to four stars. Hopefully Amazon will edit this description to what the seller requested.If you have any questions about how to cut it, just ask the seller and they will contact you and give you detailed instructions on how to cut it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good clear reflection
reviews.reviewText: Using it in my rv no chance of broken glass. Easy to drill holes and mount to door. Don't bend it it's easy to cause stress marks and very easy to scratch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Sad and disappointed.
reviews.reviewText: This started out as a really great idea. I was given a very old frame and I wanted to make it into a mirror. I couldn't find a mirror that would fit The frame. This product was really ideal. Until I needed to Clean it. I used water and a microfiber towel as The directions requested. It scratched my mirror All over. I'm very sad. My return window is closed so I cannot return it. I am stuck with a twenty seven dollar scratched mirror. I am sad.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So I am gonna use this to put up a whole wall mirror. I think the image is a little distorted. As you can see the bed doesn’t really aline. There is no sticky on it so make sure you buy the wall sticky’s from target. I had to order some, I’m buying 4 more this Friday so you’ll see an update of my wall as I go. For the price it’s not bad. Easy to put up and remove. Stay tuned :)06.30.23I ordered another set and they came back scratched. One mirror. I’m annoyed but I’ll be even more upset if I can’t find a way to hide it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good. But 3 came broken
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. It’s exactly like the picture. But 3 of them came broken
Approx 1/8 in thick plastic .. protected surface when new and is easily resized by scoring the back with a utility knife and slowly pushing away from the score ✅
